title: Failed to update dependencies to their latest version
body:
Automatic dependency update failed for the current master with SHA be9b557b0fe752e7af98ee77c3a3fa21ef6bae89.

The automatic dependency management cannot continue. Please fix errors reported bellow.


##### Command

```
  $ pipenv update --dev
```

<details>
  <summary>Standard output</summary>

```
Running $ pipenv lock then $ pipenv sync.

```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Standard error</summary>


##### Notes

For more information, see [Pipfile](/thoth-station/package-extract/blob/be9b557b0fe752e7af98ee77c3a3fa21ef6bae89/Pipfile) and [Pipfile.lock](/thoth-station/package-extract/blob/be9b557b0fe752e7af98ee77c3a3fa21ef6bae89/Pipfile.lock).

Once this issue is resolved, the issue will be automatically closed by bot.
